title: 2020 New Hampshire Primary - Bernie Sanders's Win and Amy Klobuchar's "Klomentum" | Lakeith Stanfield (Rebroadcast)
itunes:title: 2020 New Hampshire Primary - Bernie Sanders's Win and Amy Klobuchar's "Klomentum" | Lakeith Stanfield (Rebroadcast)
description:
Trevor covers the New Hampshire Democratic primary, Ronny Chieng examines Andrew Yang's exercise in universal basic income, and Lakeith Stanfield discusses "The Photograph." Originally aired February 13, 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
